item.title: php7.1 memcache install in CentOS7
item.description: yum install -y memcached libmemcached php71-php-pecl-memcache.x86_64 Harden memcached by at least making it listed only on loopback. Config is in /etc/sysonfig/memcached PORT="11211" USER="memcached" MAXCONN="1024" CACHESIZE="64" OPTIONS="-l 127.0.0.1 -U 0" Details in https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-install-and-secure-memcached-on-centos-7
